com.att.research.xacml.api.trace

Interface Traceable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ATTPDPEngine, DOMRule, Policy, PolicyDef, PolicyIdReference, PolicyIdReferenceBase, PolicySet, PolicySetChild, PolicySetIdReference, Rule, VariableReference

    public interface Traceable
    Defines the API for objects that can be set as the "cause" in a TraceEvent. Objects cause a TraceEvent through methods called during the evaluation of a XACML Policy or PolicySet.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Traceable getCause()
      Gets the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called.
      java.lang.String getTraceId()
      Gets the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent as a result of a policy evaluation method.

    • Method Detail

      • getTraceId

        java.lang.String getTraceId()
        Gets the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent as a result of a policy evaluation method. Implementations must not return null.
        Returns:
        the String identifier for the object that caused the TraceEvent.

      • getCause

        Traceable getCause()
        Gets the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called. If there is no known causing object, this method should return null.
        Returns:
        the Traceable that caused the evaluation method on this Traceable to be called.
